result.errorMsg: Document has invalid language code.
result.repair: Add a valid 2 letter or 3 letter language code as defined in the ISO 639 specification to the HTML 'lang' attribute. For XHTML, both 'lang' and 'xml:lang' must be set.

result.errorMsg: script may use color alone.
result.decisionPass: script does not use color alone.
result.decisionFail: script uses color alone.

result.errorMsg: script user interface may not be accessible.
result.decisionPass: script user interface is accessible.
result.decisionFail: script user interface is not accessible.

result.errorMsg: script may cause screen flicker.
result.decisionPass: script does not cause screen flicker.
result.decisionFail: script causes screen flicker.

result.errorMsg: title might not describe the document.
result.decisionPass: title describes the document.
result.decisionFail: title does not describe the document.

result.errorMsg: Unicode right-to-left marks or left-to-right marks may be required.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: Unicode right-to-left marks or left-to-right marks are used whenever the HTML bidirectional algorithm produces undesirable results.
result.decisionFail: Unicode right-to-left marks or left-to-right marks are not used whenever the HTML bidirectional algorithm produces undesirable results.

result.errorMsg: Groups of links with a related purpose are not marked.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All groups of links with a related purpose are marked.
result.decisionFail: All groups of links with a related purpose are not marked.

result.errorMsg: Abbreviations may not be marked with abbr element.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All abbreviations are marked with the abbr element.
result.decisionFail: Not all abbreviations are marked with the abbr element.

result.errorMsg: Long quotations may not be marked using the blockquote element.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All long quotations have been marked with the blockquote element.
result.decisionFail: All long quotations are not marked with the blockquote element.

result.errorMsg: Visual lists may not be properly marked.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All visual lists contain proper markup.
result.decisionFail: Not all visual lists contain proper markup.

result.errorMsg: Site missing site map.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: Page is not part of a collection that requires a site map.
result.decisionFail: Page is part of a collection that requires a site map.

result.errorMsg: Repeated components may not appear in the same relative order each time they appear.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: Repeated components appear in the same relative order on this page.
result.decisionFail: Repeated components do not appear in the same relative order on this page.

result.errorMsg: Document may be missing a "skip to content" link.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: Document contians a "skip to content" link or does not require it.
result.decisionFail: Document does not contain a "skip to content" link and requires it.

result.errorMsg: Reference to glossary may be missing.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: A glossary document is referenced or not required.
result.decisionFail: A glossary document is not referenced but is required.

result.errorMsg: Sections may not be marked with headers.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All sections of the content are marked with headers.
result.decisionFail: All sections of the content are not marked with headers.

result.errorMsg: Tabular information may be missing table markup.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: Table markup is used for all tabular information.
result.decisionFail: Table markup is not used for all tabular information.

result.errorMsg: dir attribute may be required to identify changes in text direction.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All changes in text direction are marked using the dir attribute.
result.decisionFail: All changes in text direction are not marked using the dir attribute.

result.errorMsg: Acronyms may not be marked with acronym element.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: All acronyms are marked with the acronym element.
result.decisionFail: Not all acronyms are marked with the acronym element.

result.errorMsg: Text may refer to items by shape, size, or relative position alone.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: There are no references to items in the document by shape, size, or relative position alone.
result.decisionFail: There are references to items in the document by shape, size, or relative position alone.

result.errorMsg: Document may require a breadcrumb trail.
result.errorSourceCode: <body> <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" nam ...
result.decisionPass: Document has a breadcrumb trail or does not require it.
result.decisionFail: Document does not have a breadcrumb trail and requires it.

result.errorMsg: Form submission error messages may not provide assistance.
result.errorSourceCode: <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" name="__VIE ...
result.decisionPass: All form submission error messages provide assistance in correcting the error.
result.decisionFail: All form submission error messages do not provide assistance in correcting the errors.

result.errorMsg: Form submission error messages may not identify empty required fields.
result.errorSourceCode: <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" name="__VIE ...
result.decisionPass: Required fields are identified in all form submission error messages.
result.decisionFail: Required fields are not identified in all form submission error messages.

result.errorMsg: Form may delete information without allowing for recovery.
result.errorSourceCode: <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" name="__VIE ...
result.decisionPass: Information deleted using this form can be recovered.
result.decisionFail: Information delted using this form can not be recovered.

result.errorMsg: All required form fields may not be indicated as required.
result.errorSourceCode: <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" name="__VIE ...
result.decisionPass: All required fields are indicated to the user as required.
result.decisionFail: All required fields are not indicated to the user as required.

result.errorMsg: Tab order may not follow logical order.
result.errorSourceCode: <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" name="__VIE ...
result.decisionPass: Tab order follows a logical order.
result.decisionFail: Tab order does not follow a logical order.

result.errorMsg: Form submission data may not be presented to the user before final acceptance of an irreversable transaction.
result.errorSourceCode: <form name="form1" method="post" action="Default.aspx" id="form1"> <input type="hidden" name="__VIE ...
result.decisionPass: All form submission data is presented to the user before final acceptance for all irreversable transactions.
result.decisionFail: All form submission data is not presented to the user before final acceptance for all irreversable transactions.
